title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I am first time going to participate in signature campaign but while it's been very hard to quickly and accurately copy the code, I first thought of this small issue that , I can press Ctrl+A to copy accurately but this don't worked instead it copied whole page, so is this a good idea to build a copy button to copy codes in one click?or you use any other simple trick to copy quickly and accurately please share.

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 02, 2023, 10:54:40 AMany other simple trick to copy quickly and accurately please share.Try a mouse.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: It is very simple to copy the signature code on computer or laptop directly using the mouse. It can be hard on mobile phone, but if you do not want it to be hard, you can start to copy the first and last words that are not in the signature code, copy them together with the signature code. Paste it and remove the first and the last word.The first word is 'code', while the last word will be the next rank, like 'senior member' rank.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: No one would object if you created a script to easily copy signature characters within the code tags. Managers would surely use it to announce their signature campaigns.It's not a bad idea, but us not a necessity either, it would only take a couple of seconds to copy it on a PC and a less than a minute on movie if you're used to doing it.
